isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine - Model Years Late 1997 to 2003 - Cylinder Head And Valves - Cleaning - Cylinder Head

step1.para: Remove lifting bracket from the cylinder head.

note.para: When cleaning BE CAREFUL not to damage the cylinder head gasket surface.

step1.para: With valves installed to protect the seats, use a rotary wire brush or gasket scraper with mineral spirits to remove any deposits and gasket material from the gasket surface of the cylinder head.

Use a suitable solvent and brush to remove any dirt, grease and other deposits from all of the bolt holes, oil return holes, water passages and fuel galleries. Rinse thoroughly with hot water and dry the cylinder heads with filtered compressed air.
